name: Dice Crawler (slatealex)
description:
Small rogue-lite dungeon crawler where your movements and actions are restricted by the geometry of a six-sided dice.

Instructions:

  • Try to survive as many levels as you can.
  • Use WASD to move the dice.
  • Kill all enemies in to unlock the door to the next room.
  • The active 'Action' is the action on the top face of the dice.
  • You can get new actions by opening chests.
  • You will be able to add new actions to your dice in between levels.
  • Moving in the direction of an enemy will use the action on them.
  • Your health is at the bottom left corner of the screen. When this reaches zero, you lose.
  • Items can be used by rolling the dice in their direction.
